intro: Brachyramphus schimperi, commonly known as the Schimper's auklet, is a small seabird belonging to the auk family. It is characterized by its compact body, short wings, and distinctive black-and-white plumage. This species is primarily found in the North Atlantic, breeding on remote islands and coastal cliffs.
